Interface BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IFullscreenView

All Superinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:

Enclosing class:

public static interface BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IFullscreenView
extends IActivityLifeCycleAware

Interface describes fullscreen Burstly activity view.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
